exceptions.exn: The LHS of sup_appE (sup _ _) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment A : Type B : A -> lattice s : Pred (dfunLattice B) x : A Unable to unify "simpl_fun (Pred ?T) Prop" with "sup s x = sup [Pred y | exists f : dfunLattice B, f \\In s /\\ y = f x]".

original: rewrite sup_appE. apply sup_closed. intros d Hd. apply supP. exists d. split. * apply Hd. * reflexivity.
